description:
Don't download the NaCl toolchain if GYP_DEFINES contains disable_nacl=1

BUG=none
TEST=manual


Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=113279

messages.text:
lgtm

http://codereview.chromium.org/8820022/diff/1/build/download_nacl_toolchains.py
File build/download_nacl_toolchains.py (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/8820022/diff/1/build/download_nacl_toolchains.py#newcode14
build/download_nacl_toolchains.py:14: if 'disable_nacl=1' in os.environ.get('GYP_DEFINES', ''):
How about 'disable_nacl=1' in os.environ.get('GYP_DEFINES', '').split(' '):

http://codereview.chromium.org/8820022/diff/1/build/download_nacl_toolchains.py

I don't feel strongly about this, I just duplicated the chromeos=1 check in the next line

ok, fair enough. as you have it then.
